item.title: The Looking Glass Club Reviewed
item.author: Louise Murphy,
item.description: ‘The Looking Glass Club’ tells the story of a rather elusive Union society – a society without a stall at the Freshers’ fair anyway; a society which convenes in a dark and dank room somewhere underneath South Kensington, accessible only through a secret tunnel with the membership list kept a closely …

item.title: Come and join The Looking Glass Club
item.author: Louise Murphy,
item.description: I should start off by saying that I loved the book – you’ve converted me to Science Fiction! Fantastic! You weren’t a sci-fi fan before then? No, and I was nervous about reading it in case I thought it was awful! Lots of people have felt the same way –I’ve had some fantastic feedback from people …
